content: प्रयत्नः {@--1@} Effort, exertion, endeavour; <ls>R. 2. 56</ls>; <ls>Mu. 5. 20.</ls> {@--2@} Persevering or continued effort; perseverance. {@--3@} Labour, difficulty; प्रयत्नप्रेक्षणीयः संवृत्तः <ls>Ś. 1</ls> ‘hardly visible’, ‘seen with difficulty’. {@--4@} Great care, caution; कृतप्रयत्नोऽपि गृहे विनश्यति <ls>Pt. 1. 20.</ls> {@--5@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) Effort in uttering, effort of the mouth in the production of articulate sounds; see <ls>Sk.</ls> on <ls>P. VIII. 2. 1.</ls> {@--6@} (In <ab>phil.</ab>) Active effort of three kinds; प्रवृत्तिश्च निवृत्तिश्च तथा जीवनकारणम् . एवं प्रथत्नत्र्यैविध्यं तांत्रिकैः परिदर्शितम्. {@--7@} Activity, action in general. ( प्रयत्नतः, प्रयत्नेन-त्नात् &c. {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} With great effort, diligently. {@--2@} Assiduously. {@--3@} Hardly, scarcely. {@--4@} Particularly, specially).
